data.title: John Talbot Earl of Shrewsbury
data.text:
Birthca 1388

Death17 Jul 1453, Slain at Chastillon, nr Bordeaux

BurialWhitchurch, Salop (MI)

General2nd s. 1st earl. On campaign, etc over 39 years. KG 141: 1424; N 21.

FatherRichard Talbot Lord Talbot (ca1361-ca1396)

MotherAnkaret Lestrange Baroness Strange (ca1361-1413)

Notes for John Talbot Earl of Shrewsbury

And: lord Talbot, lord Furnivale, lord Strange of Blackmere, count of Clermont, earl of Waterford.

Arms Generally notes for John Talbot Earl of Shrewsbury

Burke's Armory of 1842: Gules a lion rampant within a bordure engrailed or.

_______________________________________________________

From St John Hope's "Garter Stall Plates", plate LI, pub 1901:

Arms: Quarterly:

1: Azure a lion and a bordure gold (Talbot),

2: Gules a lion and a bordure engrailed gold (Talbot),

3: Silver two lions passant gules (Strange)

4: Silver a bend and six martlets gules (Furnivall)

Crest: A gold lion lion on a cap of estate gules.

_________________________________________________________

DNB Main notes for John Talbot Earl of Shrewsbury
